content: कुटुंबिकः, कुटुंबिन् {%<ab>m.</ab>%} {@--1@} A householder, married man, a {%paterfamilias%}, one who has a family to support or take care of; प्रायेण गृहिणीनेत्राः कन्यार्थेषु कुटुंबिनः <ls>Ku. 6. 85</ls>; <ls>V. 3. 1</ls>; <ls>Ms. 3. 80</ls>; <ls>Y. 2. 45.</ls> {@--2@} (<ab>fig.</ab>) One who takes care of anything. {@--3@} A peasant. {@--4@} A member of a family; <ls>Śānti. 4. 9.</ls> --नी {@--1@} The wife of a householder, a house wife (in charge of the house); भवतु कुटुंबिनीमाहूय पृच्छामि <ls>Mu. 1</ls>; प्रभवंत्योऽपि हि भर्तृषु कारणकोपाः कुटुंबिन्यः <ls>M. 1. 17</ls>; <ls>R. 8. 86</ls>; <ls>Amaru. 48.</ls> {@--2@} A large household or family. {@--3@} A woman in general.
